website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for those who like the colorful selection, but these socks might not work for shorter individuals.
pros: Available in a wide range of stylish colors and patterns
cons: Too long on individuals with short legs

customer_reviews.title: Size M was way too big, but I still like them!
customer_reviews.text: These socks helped me feel better immediately. Some reviewers here say there isn't enough compression, but for me it's perfect. The only thing I need to do is remember to order my next pair(s) in size SMALL. I ordered my first pair to try them out, in a size medium, and the 'heel' pocket sits way above my ankle, and I have to fold the tops over so they don't go up past my knees. I'm 5' 4", slim calf, US women's size 8.5 foot.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyCatLady

customer_reviews.title: No compression.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these had no compression. I have another pair that is the same brand That I got almost 2 years ago and these just are not the same quality. I have boot socks that provided more compression than these. I have average calf size and they don’t work for me. If you aren’t struggling to out them on then they are not tight enough. I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Gates

customer_reviews.title: What a Relief! These make a real difference!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for both water retention in my legs and as the sock under my leg brace. Such a difference in how my legs feel! More energy and not swollen at the end of the day. works great under my brace, and doesn't interfere with it's function. Great socks.
customer_reviews.author: Diane in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks! I have a few pairs and they are my favorite compression socks to wear. Love that the foot part has a little more Nd helps give my feet’s some cushion for long hour shifts on my feet. I only wish there were some more new patterns to purchase that are just as fun.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sharchuk

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks! They give my legs the right compression and support. They are so cute and fit very well! I’d buy another pair in a minute!
customer_reviews.author: Happyretiree68

customer_reviews.title: Meh would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Thin slippery material didnt feel as much compression as I would have liked and felt like my feet slid around in my shoe, I wear a little bit bigger shoe for work due to swelling after 12+ hours on my feet
customer_reviews.author: broncotexasranger208

customer_reviews.title: Extra padding for the win!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pair of compression socks. The toes and heel have extra padding that I just love.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Robertson

customer_reviews.title: No compression
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice sock but no compression. Plan to return. Bought because of reviews but I find no compression
customer_reviews.author: George M. Belansek

customer_reviews.title: Game Day Socks
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves these and wears them when he watches his beloved Patriots play football.
customer_reviews.author: P. Knox

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: It’s run too small for me to tight omg I can’t put it on. I buy a (M) and it’s not fit at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and good compression! I wear them all day for surgery!
customer_reviews.author: Justanothergirl

customer_reviews.title: The best I have found
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'4" - These are the only knee high compression socks I have found that actually come up to my knees. Better yet, they stay there instead of creeping down when I excursive or walk around. They also look better than any of my others when I wear them with shorts. This is the only brand I will buy from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Dave T. Garland III

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband who's on his feet for 13 hours a day. He loved them! Great quality and they're cute. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: terrible quality, and way too small does not fit as seller claims.
customer_reviews.text: terrible quality, so many bulky loose threads on the inside would be horrible uncomfortable to wear. Way too small, will not fit a 18" calf like they claim, even verified with seller before purchase..Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected! I am a size 6.5-7 shoe and purchased a small. Good compression from foot to calve!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right size
customer_reviews.text: I have already ordered 12 pairs , because the socks have helped me get through a work day in the health field. My pain in my feet went from 10 to 1. I will continue ordering more until I get all the colors and styles.❤️
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Carswell

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! They fit as expected and they are fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jai Gervin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: As compression socks, these work as expected. Unfortunately, the black thread that creates the black lines is not secured on the back. This causes the thread to come out and leave gaps in the line.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

product_meta.title: A-Swift Compression Socks Women & Men 20-30mmhg - Suits Nurses, Maternity Pregnancy - Below Knee High
product_meta.description:
Why this is a great value buy? 

 BETTER PERFORMANCE - Stimulates blood flow and improves oxygen delivery to your muscles. This equals faster recovery and better performance. 

 REDUCES SWELLING - Reduces foot and leg swelling, lactic acid production and cramping. 

 PREVENTS INJURIES - Relieves plantar fasciitis, shin splints, calf cramps, pulled muscles, achilles and heel cup issues, blisters, blood pooling. Lightly padded at the ball and on top of the foot to promote comfort and eliminate abrasion and foot stress. 

 DRYNESS & COMFORT - There is optimum moisture control. Keeps your feet dry, fresh and comfortable (Dry feet = Less blisters). 

 PERFECT FOR THESE ACTIVITIES - Running - Jogging - Walking - Soccer - Baseball - Football - Basketball - Cycling - Triathletes - Hiking - Crossfit - Field Sports - Stands long time at work (retail, nursing, travel, hospitality) - Traveling by plane / Long distance traveling / Wearing High Heel Shoes 

 GUARANTEED - We are most confident that you'll love our compression socks. But if for whatever reason it just doesn't work as you'd hoped, we've got you covered with a hassle free LIFETIME GUARANTEE! Just send them back our way, and we'll gladly refund your money, no problem! 

 GIVE IT A TRY! CLICK "ADD TO CART" BUTTON NOW AND FEEL THE DIFFERENCE!! 

 (SPECIAL REMINDER: Please refer to the size chart to select the suitable size. The size chart can be found in the images of the listing. Scroll through the images and you'll find it!)
feature_bullets: GRADUATED COMPRESSION (20 - 30 mmHg) and FASTER MUSCLE RECOVER - Better Blood Circulation as strongest compression happens at the ankle, and gradually decreases moving up the leg. Better oxygen circulation helps reduce lactic acid build up and aids muscle recovery.
FUN DESIGNS, QUALITY CONSTRUCTION & COMFORT – Our socks are colorful and fun to wear! So too are they comfortable and durable! The toe and heel portion are reinforced for added support and comfort.
COMFORTABLE FABRIC - Helps regulate temperature by keeping you warm when cold, and cool when hot.
WICKS MOISTURE AWAY - The materials are breathable and wicks moisture away. This keeps you dry even with longer use.

IDEAL FOR SPORTS and DAILY WEAR - Reduces muscle fatigue, especially if on your feet for long periods of time, traveling or all sports e.g. cross fit, skiing, running, hiking and more (SPECIAL REMINDER : Please refer to the size chart as shown in the images of the listing to select the suitable size to purchase)
